review: I got this for my daughter to be able to stream Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu, she loves it, easy to use, easy to set up, unlike our smart TV there is no interruption in the movie/show due to buffering issues.  Our internet connection can be very slow at times, but no issues with the Fire TV Stick.
author: MHend

review: We really wanted to love the Fire TV Stick.If you only use Amazon Prime Instant Video, then this is the device for you! Amazon Prime Instant Video runs like a dream. Absolutely no issues until you start using third party apps. It freezes in Hulu, Netflix, and any other third party app. These freezes can occur every couple of minutes all the way up to 10-20 seconds apart. Also, the remote seems to go into some sort of hyper mode where one click will register has 5 - 10 clicks, almost as if you were holding the button down.At this point we only use it for Prime Video. I regret buying and should have returned it when I had the chance. There are much better streaming choices for cable cutters.
author: Scott Vaverchak

review: Do yourself a favor. Buy this and ditch your satellite or cable provider. Your wallet will thank you.
author: MykDnm

review: I LOVE this! I was debating between this or a Roku, but I am definitely more than pleased with my choice. I also love the fact that it is readily transferrable. I take it over to my friends or on vacations so easily. There are tons and tons of apps that are available for download. Far more than I have seen on any other comparable device. I also love the fact that it has a screen saver for when not in use.
author: Brittany Spain
